text: Yeh log bhalayi se pehle burayi ke liye jaldi macha rahey hain, halanke insey pehle (jo log is rawish par chale hain unpar khda ke azaab ki) ibrat-naak misaalein guzar chuki hain. Haqeeqat yeh hai ke tera Rubb logo ki zyadatiyon ke bawajood unke saath chashm-poshi (forbearance) se kaam leta hai aur yeh bhi haqeeqat hai ke tera Rubb sakht saza dene wala hai
